ai-cp1:1.1_0: Reverence to him, the Fortunate One, the Worthy One, the Perfect Sambuddha
ai-cp1:2.1_0: “One hundred thousand people making a thousand sacrifices
ai-cp1:3.1_0: in the past, future, and present
ai-cp1:3.2_0: I’ve established the ties of rebirth.
ai-cp1:3.3_0: While set up a proper conduct
ai-cp1:4.1_0: When I’m a wilderness dwelling in the forest,
ai-cp1:5.1_0: But at that time the mortification in mind
ai-cp1:5.4_0: and went to me on walking for alms.
ai-cp1:6.3_0: Having seen him standing at the door, he stable:
ai-cp1:7.1_0: The Lord of the World, having given them up,
ai-cp1:7.2_0: Having laid down the pot, he put down the pot.
ai-cp1:7.3_0: See the way that looks after!
ai-cp1:8.4_0: so too I am able to discern the Dhamma.”
ai-cp1:9.1_0: I won’t have a reason for you,
ai-cp1:9.3_0: joy is happy through with happiness.
ai-cp1:9.4_0: apart from the day, for the all of you!
ai-cp1:10.2_0: I’ll have been under your control.
ai-cp1:10.3_0: free of deceit, alert, and mindful,
ai-cp1:11.4_0: and those who like work left behind.”
ai-cp1:12.1_0: whose conduct is first because of what.
